name: Emote Quest 2 Fallen Moon
description:
Created in 72 hours for the MoonMoon 2020 Game Jam

This version has some updated content and changes for players to enjoy for the first time!

After the events of the first game, Papaya finally reaches her destination after jumping in the pit. She does not find the freedom she was hoping for, but more horrors awaiting her. More monsters and bosses will stop at nothing to see her fail Along the way, however, she meets old and new friends that aid her on her journey for freedom once again!

Special thanks to my brother @Megacrustle who made all the artwork in my game!

Controls:
Z - Interact/Select
X - Cancel
Esc - Menu
